action.action-desc: Ms. Castor of Florida introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to provide the Commission with notice and comment rulemaking authority respecting unfair or deceptive acts or practices and to provide for civil penalties for violations of such Act respecting unfair or deceptive acts or practices, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the 21st Century FTC Act.

section.header: Rulemaking respecting unfair or deceptive acts or practices
section.text: The Federal Trade Commission Act (15 U.S.C. 41 et seq.) is amended—

clause.text: in paragraph (1), by striking , and shall also and all that follows and inserting a period; and
by striking (1) When prescribing and inserting When prescribing;

subclause.text: by striking (A) a statement and all that follows through (B) a statement and inserting a statement; and
by striking ; and (C) a statement and all that follows and inserting a period; and

clause.text: in paragraph (2)(A), by striking subsections (b) and (c) and inserting subsection (b); and
in paragraph (1)(B), by striking the transcript required by subsection (c)(5),;

in paragraph (3), by striking , or if and all that follows and inserting the following: , or if the court finds that the Commission’s action is not supported by substantial evidence in the rulemaking record (as defined in paragraph (1)(B) of this subsection) taken as a whole. The term evidence, as used in this paragraph, means any matter in the rulemaking record.;
in paragraph (5)(C), by striking the first and third sentences;
by redesignating paragraphs (3) through (5) as paragraphs (2) through (4), respectively; and

subparagraph.text: in subsection (a)(1), by striking or section 18; and

clause.text: in paragraph (1), by striking , except and all that follows and inserting a period; and
in paragraph (2), by striking Except as specified in paragraph (1), no and inserting No.

section.header: Civil penalties for violations of Federal Trade Commission Act respecting unfair or deceptive acts or practices
section.text: Section 5(m)(1)(A) of the Federal Trade Commission Act (15 U.S.C. 45(m)(1)(A)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting this Act or after violates; and
by inserting a violation of this Act or is before prohibited.
